answers.answer: Prayers are with you Hon, hope it all goes well. Keep us updated :-)
Prayers for u nd ur babies hun..have faith all will go well....god is good..
Prayers your way! Keep us updated please. My sister has preeclampsia but she had an easy delivery with both her girls, good luck!

question: got diagnosed and admitted to hospital Sundayorning early hours with preeclampsia , currently 36+3 days with DCDA twins. Keeping me until babies are delivered possibly before the weekend, scared but excited. Anyone else dealing with pre-eclampsia?
title: Preeclampsia
